org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors

Class ContinuousFeatureProcessor<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors.ContinuousFeatureProcessor<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Information about regions. Designed to contain information which will make computations of impurity optimal.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureProcessor<D,ContinuousSplitInfo<D>>

    public class ContinuousFeatureProcessor<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>
extends Object
implements FeatureProcessor<D,ContinuousSplitInfo<D>>
    Container of projection of samples on continuous feature.

      • performSplit

        public IgniteBiTuple<RegionProjection,RegionProjection> performSplit(com.zaxxer.sparsebits.SparseBitSet bs,
                                                                     RegionProjection<D> reg,
                                                                     D leftData,
                                                                     D rightData)
        Splits given region using bitset which maps data point to left or right subregion. This method is present for the vectors of the same type to be able to pass between them information about regions and therefore used iff the optimal split is received on feature of the same type.
        Specified by:
        performSplit in interface FeatureProcessor<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo,ContinuousSplitInfo<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>>
        Parameters:
        bs - Bitset which maps data point to left or right subregion.
        leftData - Data of the left subregion.
        rightData - Data of the right subregion.
        Returns:
        This feature vector.

      • performSplitGeneric

        public IgniteBiTuple<RegionProjection,RegionProjection> performSplitGeneric(com.zaxxer.sparsebits.SparseBitSet bs,
                                                                            double[] labels,
                                                                            RegionProjection<D> reg,
                                                                            RegionInfo leftData,
                                                                            RegionInfo rightData)
        Splits given region using bitset which maps data point to left or right subregion. This method is used iff the optimal split is received on feature of different type, therefore information about regions is limited to the RegionInfo class which is base for all classes used to represent region data.
        Specified by:
        performSplitGeneric in interface FeatureProcessor<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo,ContinuousSplitInfo<D extends ContinuousRegionInfo>>
        Parameters:
        bs - Bitset which maps data point to left or right subregion.
        leftData - Data of the left subregion.
        rightData - Data of the right subregion.
        Returns:
        This feature vector.
